UI_visible_response: Read 29 web pagesView Page DetailsThe network buzzword "被代表" (bèi dài biǎo) means that someone's views or opinions are claimed to be represented by others without their consent or actual agreement. It is often used to express dissatisfaction or sarcasm when someone feels that their stance has been misrepresented or decided on their behalf by others.CopyTry AgainShare
traffic_visible_response: The network buzzword "被代表" (bèi dài biǎo) means that someone's views or opinions are claimed to be represented by others without their consent or actual agreement. It is often used to express dissatisfaction or sarcasm when someone feels that their stance has been misrepresented or decided on their behalf by others[^2^].
